sabbe sankhara anichachathi eesa maggo wisudadhiya. 20.6 sabbe sankhara dukkhathi eesa maggo wisuddhiya. 20.7 sabbe dhamma anaththathi 20.8 uttanakalamhi anuttano panynyaya maggan alaso na windathi. 20.9 wachanurakkhi manasa susanwutho aaradhaye maggan isippawedithan. 20.10 yoga we jayathi bhuri, yathabhuri pawaddathi. 20.11 wanan chindatha, ma rukkhan nibbana hotha bhikkhawo. 20.12.
